schema.description: 企业标识，也称企业id，字符串形式，可在云效访问链接中获取，如https://devops.aliyun.com/organization/【OrganizationId】
流水线分组名，企业唯一

requestId.title: Id of the request
requestId.description: 请求id，每次请求都是唯一值，便于后续排查问题

success.description: true 接口调用成功，false 接口调用失败

403.errorMessage: The user is not in the organization and is not authorized to perform the operation.

404.errorMessage: The current user is not in the organization and has no permission to operate.

responseDemo:

title: 创建流水线分组
